ComicInfo.Summary:
"The Kindly Ones" part 13, the conclusion to Neil Gaiman's last major SANDMAN arc, changes everything about the Dreaming. As everything comes to a close and pieces fall into place, one final conversation takes place between brother and sister.
The most rigoriously (perhaps) unexpected event of The Sandman series happens.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-08-06 16:34:15. [CVDB41083]
